mapper.select: select SQID from ${tableName} where SQID is not NULL and UP_STATE <> '1' or UP_STATE is null
select t.* from T_API_JQYLQXJG_YLQXSCXK t where t.SQID=#{sqId}
select ZZJGDM ZZJGDM,CPMC CPMC,ZCZH ZCZH,CPLB CPLB,SFSTSC SFSTSC,WTQX WTQX,DZRQ DZRQ,BZ BZ from T_API_JQYLQXJG_YLQXSCXK_CPZB where SQID=#{sqId}
select t.* from T_API_JQYLQXJG_YLQXJYXK t where t.SQID=#{sqId}
select t.* from T_API_JQYLQXJG_YLQXWTSCBA t where t.SQID=#{sqId}
select t.* from T_API_JQYLQXJG_YLQXWTSCBA_WTZB t where t.SQID=#{sqId}
select t.* from T_API_JQYLQXJG_YLQXWLXSBA_SFZB t where t.SQID=#{sqId}
select t.* from T_API_YLQXSCQYJC_RWSJBXX t where t.ZJ is not NULL and t.UP_STATE <> '1' or t.UP_STATE is null
select t.* from T_API_YLQXSCQYJC_JCCPXX t where t.RWSBH = #{rwsbh}
select t.* from T_API_YLQXSCQYJC_JCX t where t.RWSBH = #{rwsbh}
select t.* from T_API_YLQXSCQYJC_JCZ t where t.RWSBH = #{rwsbh}
